show.subtitle: Dr. Len and Nurse Vicki discuss various natural and holistic health topics while taking your calls.
show.title: Prescriptions For Health

title: Prescriptions For Health
content:
Regrets for the dying that are lessons for the living What to do and say to a friend who is seriously ill Is the Gulf... <!--more--> War Syndrome a real disease or is it just in veterans’ heads?
Can erectile dysfunction be treated without medication?
What is the relationship between vitamin levels and heart disease?

Vicki’s 20-20 tips are: Things to stop doing to yourself Love-making tips for seniors
